data.message:
Not today boi....
 backup you Vanilla Ice looking bitch
I'll be the dad you never had and correct you with a switch
Stuttering like John just to tell us what yo name is
Riding on my coattail cuz right now that's where yo Fame is
Now go to sleep little boy ain't you supposed to be in bed
Or do we need to check for Trump the monster under your bed
My name is,  my name is,  my name is. ... nobody remembered until you got famous off of Trumps name. Bitch....
